name: Organic Shiitake Mushroom Grow Kit
description: Grow your own shiitake mushrooms at home with this organic grow kit. Includes everything you need to get started.

name: Mushroom Farm - 10 Mushroom Growing Blocks
description: Grow 10 different types of mushrooms at home with this mushroom farm kit. Includes everything you need to get started.

name: Dried Porcini Mushrooms
description: Premium dried porcini mushrooms imported from Italy. Great for adding flavor to soups, sauces, and pasta dishes.

name: Mushroom Plug Spawn - Shiitake
description: Grow your own shiitake mushrooms with this mushroom plug spawn. Easy to use, just drill holes in a log and insert the plugs.

name: Mushroom Cultivation: An Illustrated Guide to Growing Your Own Mushrooms at Home
description: Learn how to grow your own mushrooms at home with this comprehensive guide. Includes step-by-step instructions and full-color illustrations.
